name: places/ChIJZ7-CBJlZwokRYdCIBLmM_ZU
adrFormatAddress: 831 Broadway, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I have never experienced a landlord so horrifying in my entire life. DO NOT LIVE IN A BUILDING SPONSORED BY GREEN LIVING. There are a million things to say about this company. The landlord did not respond to a single email we had about the multitude of problems in our unit, some being that our oven did not work a single day we lived in the unit, every single thing was covered in about 3 months worth of dust, all silverware and appliances were covered in mac and cheese and other foods, one of the three beds was broken, the wall above one bed crumbled constantly so the bed and person in it were covered in dust and drywall particles, there was a horrifying smell in the apartment, our wifi we pay $340 a month for did not work, the walls were covered in a sticky yellow substance along with many more issues. They instead sent in around 10-15 tours a week with absolutely no notice all of a sudden someone would just enter our apartment. The floor plans they provide are nowhere near accurate. My room is exclusively a bed, there is no standing room, despite the fact that the floorplan shows a desk as well as about 24 square feet of standing room. The one time we finally got someone to come to our unit all she could say was that it was not her fault and she didnt want to "get in between anything" when she was the only person we had even spoken to from the company. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES.
